data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 5,688 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Lugo.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lugo, Galicia, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Lugo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Lugo, Galicia, Spain.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Lugo, Galicia, Spain to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Monforte de Lemos
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Monforte de Lemos, Galicia, Spain.
Spirit, teach the 5,688 believers in Lugo that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 355,200 people living in Lugo, Galicia, Spain. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Lugo, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Lugo
location.cities_list: Lugo, Monforte de Lemos, Viveiro, Vilalba, Mos
location.cities_list_w_pop: Lugo (96,678), Monforte de Lemos (19,546), Viveiro (16,238), Vilalba (15,437), Mos (14,650)
